alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range; Marsh and Arbon Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 08 at 12:18PM MST until January 10 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TUESDAY TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches, except 10 to 20 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Marsh and Arbon Highlands-Bear River Range- Including the cities of Inkom, McCammon, Downey, Lava Hot Springs, and Emigration Summit. * WHEN...From 8 AM Tuesday to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bear River Range; Marsh and Arbon Highlands
